unit_specific.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

transport_capacity.capacity_text: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Death Guard Infantry models.

composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: This model is equipped with: a combi-bolter and armoured tracks.
wargear_options: This model can be equipped with 1 additional combi-bolter.
This model can be equipped with 1 havoc launcher.

leader: This unit cannot be led by any Character and cannot lead other units.
